Dorien Huijser is training coordinator for the Research Data Netherlands (RDNL) project "[National training and community platform for research data professionals](https://researchdata.nl/en/national-training-and-community-platform-for-research-data-professionals/)" at 4TU.ResearchData, in Delft, The Netherlands. This project focuses on creating a national data stewards curriculum, training, community resources and formalized recognition through badging - all with the aim to professionalize research data stewardship in The Netherlands.

Previously, Dorien worked as a data steward at Leiden University, Erasmus University Rotterdam, and Utrecht University, respectively, providing support for researchers concerning the management of their research data.
